column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////The very first time we came here we waited a while to be seated
column2: the host advised us to order right away so that we would not have to wait more once we got a table. I appreciated that! We ordered the classic deep dish Lou's pizza - it was amazingly yummy (first time trying out Chicago style pizza)
column3: we got truly stuffed and were content and satisfied!!!! The restaurant atmosphere was great! Service was decent! There is no other pizza joint that compares to Lou's pizza
column4: I'M IN LOVE WITH THIS PLACE! KUDOS!
